name: Delicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Calla Lily Seafood Soup.

customize.name: Crab
customize.desc: A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.

customize.name: Calla Lily
customize.desc: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Calla Lily Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.

customize.name: Suspicious Calla Lily Seafood Soup
customize.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.
